thread.title: Kotoko to offload goalkeeper Joseph Addo following arrival of Ernest Sowah report
thread.title_full: Kotoko to offload goalkeeper Joseph Addo following arrival of Ernest Sowah report

title: Kotoko to offload goalkeeper Joseph Addo following arrival of Ernest Sowah report
text:
18:55 CET Kotoko to offload goalkeeper Joseph Addo following arrival of Ernest Sowah â€“ report Joseph Addo 
Kotoko goalkeeper Joseph Addo is on the verge of being transfer-listed following the arrival of Ernest Sowah. 
The former Heart of Lions shot-stopper is rumoured to be on his way out of the club after failing to impress since joining the side. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
